articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Rashmika's 'Bollywood has romantic songs south has item numbers' divides Twitter - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rashmika Mandanna’s comment about south Indian film music has been criticised by a section of people online, with some reacting angrily on social media. Some fans have also defended the actor.  | Bollywood
articles.content: Rashmika Mandanna's latest comment on the music of Bollywood films versus that in south Indian cinema has not gone down well with a section of people. At the song launch of her forthcoming Hindi rele… [+2397 chars]

articles.title: 'Nashe mein talli hai': Sohail Khan's 'drunk' video from Salman Khan's birthday bash goes viral; netizens troll the actor - Times of India
articles.description: Salman Khan's 57th birthday bash was a star-studded one which was attended by Shah Rukh Khan, Kartik Aaryan, Pooja Hegde among many Bollywood A listers. His family too was present who also posed for the paparazzi. Now, a video of Salman's brother Sohail surfa…

articles.title: Chinese Woman Suspected Of Spying On Dalai Lama Detained In Bihar's Gaya - NDTV
articles.description: A Chinese woman suspected of spying on Dalai Lama detained by police in Bihar's Gaya district today. She is likely to be deported back to China.
articles.content:
New Delhi: A Chinese woman suspected of spying on Dalai Lama was detained by police today in Bihar's Gaya district. She is likely to be deported back to China.
